#summary comboboxentry widget reference

= comboboxentry widget =

A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkComboBoxEntry.html GtkComboBoxEntry]

----

== Definition ==

{{{
<comboboxentry tag_attr="value"...>
	<default>text</default>
	<variable>varname</variable>
	<input>command</input>...
	<input file>filename</input>...
	<sensitive>state</sensitive>
	<action>activity</action>...
	<action signal="type">activity</action>...
	<action type="function">parameter</action>...
	<item>data</item>...
	<output file>filename</output>
</comboboxentry>
}}}

"..." denotes acceptance of multiples of the same thing.

== Tag Attributes ==

See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkComboBoxEntry.html#GtkComboBoxEntry.object-hierarchy GtkComboBoxEntry] widget and ancestor class properties.

The following custom tag attributes are available:

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Value* || *Since* ||
|| space-expand || Pack widget expanding into space || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || ||
|| space-fill || Pack widget filling space || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || ||
|| block-function-signals || Block signal emissions from functions || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || ||
|| file-monitor || Emit signal when input file(s) change || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.8.1 ||
|| auto-refresh || Auto refresh when input file(s) change || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.8.1 ||
|| fs-action || fileselect function action type || {{{file}}}, {{{newfile}}}, {{{folder}}} or {{{newfolder}}} || ||
|| fs-filters || fileselect function pattern file filters || _pattern_{{{|}}}_pattern_{{{|}}}... || ||
|| fs-filters-mime || fileselect function mime-type file filters || _mime/type_{{{|}}}_mime/type_{{{|}}}... ([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_media_type#List_of_common_media_types common types]) || ||
|| fs-folder || fileselect function current folder || || ||
|| fs-title || fileselect function dialog title || || ||

== Signals ==

The default signal is "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkComboBox.html#GtkComboBox-changed changed]", emitted when the active item is changed and when typing into the entry.

The "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkEntry.html#GtkEntry-activate activate]" signal is emitted when the user activates the entry with the Enter key.

The "file-changed" signal is emitted if file-monitor is true and the input file being monitored has changed.

The following signals are connected-up for all widgets:

[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-button-press-event button-press-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-button-release-event button-release-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-configure-event configure-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-enter-notify-event enter-notify-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-leave-notify-event leave-notify-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-focus-in-event focus-in-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-focus-out-event focus-out-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-hide hide], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-show show], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-key-press-event key-press-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-key-release-event key-release-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-map-event map-event], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-unmap-event unmap-event]

== Functions ==

The following functions can be performed upon this widget by any widget capable of emitting signals:

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| enable || Sensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| disable || Desensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| show || Show widget || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
|| hide || Hide widget || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
|| grabfocus || Grab input focus || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
|| refresh || Reload input data || Shell variable name || ||
|| save^[1]^ || Save widget data || Shell variable name || ||
|| fileselect || Launch file selection dialog || Shell variable name || ||
|| clear || Remove all widget data || Shell variable name || ||
|| removeselected || Remove selected widget data || Shell variable name || ||
<wiki:comment>ExportTableEnd</wiki:comment>

The following general functions can be performed by any widget capable of emitting signals:

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| command || Execute command || Shell command || ||
|| exit || Exit dialog || A value for the {{{EXIT}}} shell variable || ||
|| closewindow || Close dialog || Shell variable name || ||
|| launch || Launch dialog || Shell variable name || ||
|| presentwindow || [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWindow.html#gtk-window-present Present] dialog || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
<wiki:comment>ExportTableEnd</wiki:comment>

== Notes ==

1. The save function will write the entry text to the output file if it is unique and non-null.

This widget was introduced in version 0.7.21.
